action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the apple in the cupboard, the book in the wardrobe and the broom in the freezer.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The freezer is now open. The freezer is empty.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter and a cupboard. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a book, a couch and a chair. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
You take the book. In your inventory you have a book.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a broom here.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> go to hallway
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the book in the freezer.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> go to hallway
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom and a living room here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a mop and a broom. The mop is on the floor. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the broom. In your inventory you have a broom.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> put broom in freezer
You can't go to a kitchen from here.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> put broom in freezer
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom and a living room here.

> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> put broom in freezer
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> put broom in freezer
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> go to pantry
> put broom in freezer
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer, a book and a refrigerator. The freezer is open. The book is in the freezer. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You put the broom in the freezer.

> go to kitchen
> go to living room
> go to hallway
> go to bedroom
You are in a kitchen now. There are a counter, a cupboard and a plate. The cupboard is open. The plate is in the cupboard. There are passages to a pantry and a living room here.

> go to living room
> go to hallway
> go to bedroom
You are in a living room now. There are a shelf, a table, a side table, a couch and a chair. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> go to hallway
> go to bedroom
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom and a living room here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a hallway here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there is a pillow.

> go to hallway
> go to living room
> go to kitchen
> go to pantry
> take book
> go to bedroom
> put book in wardrobe
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a broom closet, a bedroom and a living room here.

You already put the book in the freezer. Would you like to take the book and put it in the wardrobe instead?

> Yes
